name: License to Geek
description:
The fate of the earth is in your hands. Shoot the aliens before they reach the Earth.

Select turrets by pressing 1, 2 or 3. 

Choose your upgrades wisely..

Credits;

Programming & Integration - Chris Eufraimidis

Art, UI & Game Design - Dimitris Marios Kalyvas

Sound Design & Composition - Konstantinos "Promitheas" Karipidis

Special thanks to Magda Karipidou for lending her beautiful voice to our alien invaders.

For inquiries; dimitrismarioskalyvas@gmail.com, chrisefremidiss@gmail.com
